hard_constraints.description: Gotta make sure every number picks exactly one side—no ghosts and no double-agent numbers.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- value(V), C = #count{ S : partition(V, S) }, C != 1.

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check: the total sum for group A better match group B exactly or the partition is a bust.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- S1 = #sum{ V : partition(V, "a") }, S2 = #sum{ V : partition(V, "b") }, S1 != S2.
